events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application intending to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debts.
Application has been categorized under Personal Loan as the purpose involves debt consolidation and medical bills.
A loan officer specialized in personal loans has been assigned to guide the applicant through the process.
Initial review of the personal loan application to verify eligibility criteria and loan purpose was completed.
The applicant was requested to submit proof of income, identification, and medical bills related to the loan.
The applicant submitted all the required documents including payslips, ID proofs, and medical expense receipts.
Credit check was completed successfully showing a moderate credit score with no recent defaults.
Risk assessment concluded the applicant's debt-to-income ratio is acceptable and risk level is moderate.
A loan offer including terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule has been presented to the applicant.
Applicant provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed loan terms and repayment plan.
Application was escalated to senior management for final approval due to loan amount above standard limits.
The personal loan application was approved after successful review and escalation to senior management.
Loan amount was disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account as per the agreed terms and schedule.
Follow-up call was made to the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan and to answer any questions.
The loan application process was formally closed after confirming all post-approval requirements were met.
